full_summary:
Proposal Notice
====================

**Contract Title**
-------------------

VALVE, BUTTERFLY - Department of National Defence

**Reference Number**
--------------------

PW-22-01012375

**Publication Date**
-------------------

2022-11-03

**Closure Date**
----------------

2022-12-13T14:00:00

**Procurement Category**
-------------------------

Goods and Services

**Notice Type**
----------------

Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Description**
-------------

The Department of National Defence invites submissions for the procurement of valves, specifically butterfly valves, as outlined below. The delivery is requested for CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.

* **Item 1**: 6 units of VALVE, BUTTERFLY, Part No. CN-160814, NCAGE: L0470, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt.
* **Item 2**: 6 units of VALVE, BUTTERFLY, Part No. CN-160814, NCAGE: L0470, to be delivered to CFB Halifax.

Bidders are required to submit prices in Canadian dollars. Equivalent or substitute products must be identified with the brand name and model, or part number, and NCAGE.

**Important**

* This procurement is subject to a preference for Canadian Goods and Services under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
* Documents submitted in either official language of Canada will be accepted.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Contact Information**
---------------------------

For further information, please contact:

* Jean-Pierre Normandin, Department of National Defence
* Email: jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: 819-939-3674

**Documents**
------------

The complete proposal package is available on the Canada Buys website at:

* English version: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/03/307e665b6fd95fc4e24c847548d86f45/rfp_w8482-230996-a-en.pdf
* French version: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/03/6c451073f484dda8aa300ad55755f305/rfp_w8482-230996-a-fr.pdf

This notice is for informational purposes only and does not constitute a solicitation or request for proposals. The Department of National Defence reserves the right
